Foto Umar Tertidur di Pangkuan Novel Baswedan Setelah Operasi
05 Nov 2019, 08:32 by M Rosseno Aji, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Terbaring di ranjang rumah sakit, sebelah mata penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan masih diperban. Tangan kanannya mengelus kepala bocah lelaki berjaket merah yang tidur tengkurap di perutnya. Momen itu terekam dalam sebuah foto sesaat setelah Novel menjalani operasi mata untuk kesekian kali di Singapura, akhir 2017.
"Ini operasi ketiga atau keempat sekitar Desember 2017," kata Novel melalui pesan singkat, Selasa, 5 November 2019. Novel bercerita bocah yang tidur di pangkuannya itu adalah Umar Novel Baswedan, anak bungsu dari lima anak Novel dan Rina Emilda. Umar adalah anak lelaki satu-satunya keluarga itu. Rina dan Umar menemani Novel menjalani operasi di Singapura. "Umar menemani saya operasi dan Umar memang suka dekat dengan saya," kata Novel diakhiri emoji senyum.
Novel menjalani sejumlah operasi mata di Singapura akibat disiram air keras oleh dua orang tak dikenal di dekat rumahnya, di Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara, pada 11 April 2017. Serangan itu mengenai kedua matanya, merusak mata kiri.
Laporan medis Novel dari Klinik Eye & Retina Surgeons, Singapura, pada 26 Mei 2017, mencatat bahwa mantan perwira Polri ini pertama kali datang ke klinik itu pada 12 April 2017. Novel dipindahkan setelah menjalani perawatan karena cedera kimia asam sulfat di Jakarta Eye Centre pada 11 April, pukul 5 pagi.
Laporan medis juga mencatat luka bakar ringan sampai sedang pada wajah dan kelopak mata yang telah dirawat. Cedera kimiawi melibatkan kedua mata. "Ketajaman visualnya masing-masing adalah 6/24 dan 6/15 pada mata kanan dan kiri," tulis laporan medis itu.
Hasil pemeriksaan menyatakan adanya masalah 90 persen di bagian jaringan atas para epitel batas kornea yang hilang, karena adanya iskemik (terhambatnya aliran darah pada pembuluh darah mata yang mengakibatkan kematian jaringan) di limbal (batas warna pada kornea) yang terjadi pada mata kiri.
Dokter Singapura yang merawat Novel awalnya menggunakan metode sel punca untuk memulihkan matanya. Namun, metode itu tak berhasil, sehingga harus dilakukan operasi mata osteo odonto keratoprosthesi. Hingga Januari 2019, sudah empat kali Novel menjalani metode operasi untuk memulihkan pasien dengan cidera di bagian kornea mata ini.
Hingga 2,5 tahun, kasus penyiraman air keras itu belum juga terungkap. Sejumlah pegiat antikorupsi menilai polisi dan pemerintah seperti tak serius mengungkap pelaku dan aktor intelektual penyerangan terhadap penyidik yang kerap menangani kasus korupsi kakap itu. Polisi beberapa kali membentuk tim, namun hasilnya hingga nihil. Jokowi bergeming dengan desakan membentuk tim gabungan pencari fakta independen.
Sejumlah pemilik akun media sosial di Twitter malah menuding adanya rekayasa dalam penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel. Akun-akun itu mencuit dengan narasi soal adanya skenario rekayasa di kasus Novel Baswedan.
"Mungkin dulu Novel Baswedan cuma kena tetes air keras, bukan disiram air keras macam vokalisnya saint loco yang mukanya melepuh semua," tulis pemilik akun @Agung***.
Akun lainnya @Adel******** mengunggah video wawancara salah satu stasiun TV dengan Novel. Wawancara dilakukan ketika Novel Baswedan sedang berada di atas kursi roda di lorong rumah sakit. Pengunggah menyatakan video itu ditayangkan pada 18 April 2017. Ia menuding bahwa kondisi mata Novel dalam foto itu baik-baik saja.

Photo of Umar Sleeping in the Lap of the Baswedan Novel After Surgery
05 Nov 2019, 08:32 by M Rosseno Aji, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Lying in a hospital bed, one of the investigators of the Baswedan Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) investigators is still bandaged. His right hand stroked the head of the boy in the red jacket who was sleeping on his stomach. The moment was captured in a photo shortly after Novel underwent eye surgery for the umpteenth time in Singapore, late 2017.
"This is the third or fourth operation around December 2017," Novel said via text message on Tuesday, November 5, 2019. The novel tells the story of the boy who slept in his lap was Umar Novel Baswedan, the youngest of five novel children and Rina Emilda. Umar is the only son of the family. Rina and Umar accompanied Novel to undergo surgery in Singapore. "Umar accompanied me to the operation and Umar really liked being close to me," Novel said ended with a smile emoji.
Novel underwent a number of eye surgeries in Singapore due to being splashed with hard water by two unknown people near his home, in Kelapa Gading, North Jakarta, on April 11, 2017. The attack hit his eyes, damaging his left eye.
Novel medical report from the Eye & Retina Surgeons Clinic, Singapore, on May 26, 2017, notes that this former National Police officer first came to the clinic on April 12, 2017. The novel was transferred after undergoing treatment due to sulfuric acid chemical injury at the Jakarta Eye Center on 11 April, 5 a.m.
The medical report also noted mild to moderate burns on the face and eyelids that had been treated. Chemical injuries involve both eyes. "The visual acuity is 6/24 and 6/15 respectively in the right and left eye," the medical report wrote.
The results of the examination revealed a 90 percent problem in the upper tissue portion of the lost corneal epithelium, due to the ischemic (obstruction of blood flow in the eye veins resulting in tissue death) in the limbal (the color border of the cornea) that occurs in the left eye.
The Singapore doctor who treated the novel initially used the stem cell method to restore his eyes. However, this method was unsuccessful, so osteo odonto keratoprosthesi eye surgery had to be performed. Until January 2019, Novel has undergone four surgical methods to restore patients with injuries in this part of the cornea of the eye.
Up to 2.5 years, the hard watering case has not been revealed. A number of anti-corruption activists assess the police and the government as not being serious in uncovering the perpetrators and intellectual actors who attacked the investigators who often deal with the high profile corruption case. The police formed a team several times, but the results were zero. Jokowi was unmoved by the pressure to form a joint team of independent fact-finding.
A number of social media account owners on Twitter even accuse the existence of engineering in splashing hard water on the Novel. The accounts tweeted with narration about the existence of an engineering scenario in the Baswedan Novel case.
"Maybe Baswedan's novel was only hit by a drop of hard water, not doused with hard water like the saint loco vocalist whose face was blistered all," wrote the account holder @Agung ***.
Another account @Adel ******** uploaded a video interview of one TV station with Novel. Interviews were conducted while the Baswedan Novel was in a wheelchair in the hallway of the hospital. The uploader stated that the video aired on April 18, 2017. He accused that the novel's eye condition in the photo was fine.
